EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Change of Date to Registered Attendees
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW DATE: Pivotal Toronto Office Grand Opening - October 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OUR OFFICE OPENING DATE HAS CHANGED TO OCTOBER 2! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
As a registered attendee for our Toronto Office Grand Opening, please be advised the event date has changed to Thursday, October 2, 2014.
Click here to register for the new date. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
We look forward to hosting you and will provide drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment while networking with innovative leaders across multiple industries.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email: elogue@pivotal.io <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io>. EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St 11th Floor Toronto, ON Thursday, October 2nd 6pm - 9pm CONFIRM ATTENDANCE <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
